entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
